comments.body: I was about to suggest to put this in a single file and switch with a CPP define until I remembered that we spent over a day fighting CPP :grin:

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@locateHieCoreExecutable = locateRunfiles hieCoreExePath
  where
    hieCoreExePath = mainWorkspace </> exe "compiler/hie-core/hie-core-exe"
